content: grab your favorite kitty and book and cozy up under this cozy crochet blanket of many kittens stitched and caron jumbo twirl the pattern cleverly uses geometrics to create stylized cat patterning across the fabric use any colors you like to bring this playful pattern to life do double_crochet assembly color changes chains and more it s a perfect gift for the feline fan in your life gauges 16 single_crochet and 18 row = 4 10 cm motif = approx 5 12 5 cm square materials caron® jumbo twirl™ 12 oz/340 g 578 yds/528 m contrast a off white ribbon 83003 1 ball or 578 yds/528 m contrast b violet ribbon 83008 1 ball or 578 yds/528 m contrast c canal ribbon 83001 1 ball or 578 yds/528 m contrast d mustard ribbon 83010 1 ball or 578 yds/528 m contrast e soft sage ribbon 83013 1 ball or 578 yds/528 m contrast f peony ribbon 83002 1 ball or 578 yds/528 m measurement approx 61 155 cm square excluding tassels
